name: Little Humans (JeffZufferey, oenvoyage, robs118, JulienBaumgartner, DamienG002)
name_original: Little Humans (JeffZufferey, oenvoyage, robs118, JulienBaumgartner, DamienG002)
description:
Little Humans

This is Human experimentations in VR while Game Jam VR 21 having "Small World" topic. 

Your are an Alien having fews worls what you can load on table. Each time you can take human position to discovery this small environnement. 

Compatible headsets :

You can use Quest(Linked), Rift S, Vive, Valve Index. 

Commands :

Use Grip to grab objets. 

Use right controller with trigger to chose one human. 

Use left controler with trigger to teleport in space. 

You can climb using the grip.

To change the world of the little humans, grab for 3 seconds the Sphere with an example of the world inside.
